Text_lang: Best deals in all of Stormwind my friend, won't find any better. Now, what can I help you with?
Text1_lang: Best deals in all of Stormwind my friend, won't find any better. Now, what can I help you with?

Text_lang: No one's ever stolen anything out of here. Not in the whole history of... the whole history!
Text1_lang: No one's ever stolen anything out of here. Not in the whole history of... the whole history!

Text_lang: Where would you like to fly to?
Text1_lang: Where would you like to fly to?

Text_lang: Just browsing my wares or is there something specific I can help you find today?
Text1_lang: Just browsing my wares or is there something specific I can help you find today?

Text_lang: You big boss now!  You king!  All hail King $N, King of Gordok!$B$BNow that you da boss, all henchmen will give you tribute!  You left some alive, yeah boss?
Um, you kill king, yeah?  That means you take his place.  That make you da new boss!  Hail to da king!
You got me good boss!  How you get by Slip'kik??  I smart though, I watch next time!  Har har!$B$BNobody get by Slip'kik no more. Slip'kik promise!
I show you how smart I am, boss!  You be extra smart with mighty magic mojo now!$B$BUm... maybe Slip'kik use magic on self. Dat would be good idea...
You da man now, dog!
Fengus make you fierce!  Crazed!  RAR!
You da boss now, yeah?  Long live da new king!$B$BKreeg let you look at Gordok hooch.  Ogre hooch best of all hooch, and Gordok hooch best of all ogre hooch!  Maybe you buy some from me, ya boss?!
You are da king of the Gordok!  You're A-number-one!
I heard you was dead... well, you won't be easy to make dead after this!
Best deals in all of Stormwind my friend, won't find any better. Now, what can I help you with?
Text1_lang: Best deals in all of Stormwind my friend, won't find any better. Now, what can I help you with?

Text_lang: Where is it ye would like to go $g lad : lass;? For just a few coin my Gryphons can get ye there faster than even the swiftest horse.
Text1_lang: Where is it ye would like to go $g lad : lass;? For just a few coin my Gryphons can get ye there faster than even the swiftest horse.

Text_lang: These great beasts know paths that ye can't find on foot, they'll get ye there fast and maybe show ye something new at the same time.
Text1_lang: These great beasts know paths that ye can't find on foot, they'll get ye there fast and maybe show ye something new at the same time.

Text_lang: Hey there, kid.
Text1_lang: Hey there, kid.
It is not yet your time. I shall aid your journey back to the realm of the living... for a price.

Greetings, $c.  I am Miranda Breechlock - one of but a few authorized equipment and materiel quartermasters for the Dawn.$B$BAs you fight evil under our commission - all the while earning our respect and trust - you'll earn valor tokens from Duke Zverenhoff.  Tokens serve two purposes: use them to gain increased standing within our ranks, or use them as tender in acquiring special items.$B$BAs you improve your standing with the Dawn, you'll discover that more items will be made available to you.
It is said that Kel'Thuzad seeks the legendary Atiesh, greatstaff of the Guardian.$B$BYes, the very staff once held by Medivh.

Text_lang: What is the Brotherhood of the Light? Well... We are all members of the Argent Dawn at the core - members of the Argent Dawn that aren't held in check by morals, guilt and useless human emotion. Consider us Scarlet Crusade minus the stupidity, lack of leadership, and blind zealotry.$B$BDon't let the Scarlet Commander tell you otherwise.$B$BAnd don't let Tyrosus know I said that... It would be a terrible shame if I had to brutally maim him should a brawl break out.

To lay these souls to rest, I must restore their valor. They have had it stolen, stripped from them.$B$BIf you assist me in restoring their honor, they can go with the Light once more. And in return, the souls of the vengeful can go with you.
Text1_lang: To lay these souls to rest, I must restore their valor. They have had it stolen, stripped from them.$B$BIf you assist me in restoring their honor, they can go with the Light once more. And in return, the souls of the vengeful can go with you.

Text_lang: Stormwind is the pillar of the human race, maintained through strength of will and the edge of a sturdy blade.
Text1_lang: Stormwind is the pillar of the human race, maintained through strength of will and the edge of a sturdy blade.

Text_lang: Through rigorous retraining I have had to break many students of all they had previously learned so that I might teach them anew.  The service I offer becomes increasingly difficult to perform each time it is done.  It is for that reason that it becomes increasingly expensive with each retraining.  Do you desire that I break you of the talents you have learned?
Text1_lang: Through rigorous retraining I have had to break many students of all they had previously learned so that I might teach them anew.  The service I offer becomes increasingly difficult to perform each time it is done.  It is for that reason that it becomes increasingly expensive with each retraining.  Do you desire that I break you of the talents you have learned?

Text_lang: Impulse purchases are the most fun kind of purchases!
Text1_lang: Impulse purchases are the most fun kind of purchases!
Ah, $r... I possess great knowledge a' da world and how ta create charms a' great power.

Text_lang: Come in, come in. Just don't sit too close to the stove. It hasn't exploded yet today, but just to be safe I think you should sit elsewhere.
Text1_lang: Come in, come in. Just don't sit too close to the stove. It hasn't exploded yet today, but just to be safe I think you should sit elsewhere.
Mau'ari know why you seek her out...$B$BBring me da E'ko you find in the world, an' I can transform it for you.

Text_lang: Just browsing my wares or is there something specific I can help you find today?
Text1_lang: Just browsing my wares or is there something specific I can help you find today?

Text_lang:
You startled me.

Then again, everything here startles me. I can't see, I can't eat, I can't leave - but most of all I can't see!

He left books on books. Scripts and stacks of parchment but very little of the mundane. If I only had some gears and servos, I could finally see! So much left to see and I have not the means to complete my creepy censor sensors..
Text1_lang:
You startled me.

Then again, everything here startles me. I can't see, I can't eat, I can't leave - but most of all I can't see!

He left books on books. Scripts and stacks of parchment but very little of the mundane. If I only had some gears and servos, I could finally see! So much left to see and I have not the means to complete my creepy censor sensors..
Certainly, $N. You only need to tell me what reputation you would like to know about.

Text_lang:
Many among the Argent Dawn don't trust the Crusade. 

I don't blame them. Our history together is short and bloody. However, if we don't learn to work together, the Scourge will overwhelm us both.
Fastest gryphons this side of Aerie Peak. Want to take a ride?
Welcome to the Bank of Stormwind. We offer financial accounts and safety deposit boxes for valuable items. Do you already have an account with us $g sir : ma'am;?
Text1_lang: Welcome to the Bank of Stormwind. We offer financial accounts and safety deposit boxes for valuable items. Do you already have an account with us $g sir : ma'am;?

Text_lang: <The Firebrand can be summoned if it's somehow lost in the depths of the Crypts. Doing so will forcibly return it to the entrance, no matter where it happens to be.>
Text1_lang: <The Firebrand can be summoned if it's somehow lost in the depths of the Crypts. Doing so will forcibly return it to the entrance, no matter where it happens to be.>

Text_lang: A mundane apparition floats above the mysterious sigil. Its gentle repose is disturbed by your presence. An unseen hand extends out, grasping at your backpack.
Text1_lang: A mundane apparition floats above the mysterious sigil. Its gentle repose is disturbed by your presence. An unseen hand extends out, grasping at your backpack.

Text_lang:
This small, red book gives off an incredibly ominous aura. The name is emblazoned with simple font: "The Dialogues of the Dead".

You've heard no tales of this book. Perhaps that's merely because none have returned to tell of it.

Your whole body shudders as you peel back the covering. The words seem to dance and swim on the page, making it hard to focus.

The words on the page are written in an unfamiliar language, but as you stare, they seem to take on meaning, piece by piece.

As you turn the page, a chill creeps its way up your spine. You have the unmistakable feeling of being watched.

The words begin to coalesce into something recognizable.
 
Every fiber of your being is begging you to stop. To turn back. 

Before it's too late.

The book feels as if it's becoming a part of you -- an extension of your hands. 

Perhaps it's not such a bad thing. Perhaps it's best to keep going. 

To lose yourself in it.
A shade of oak floats above the mysterious sigil. Its slight shifting is unsettling. Its presence tempts you as it reaches through the darkness.
Text1_lang: A shade of oak floats above the mysterious sigil. Its slight shifting is unsettling. Its presence tempts you as it reaches through the darkness.

Text_lang: Welcome to my Inn, weary traveler. What can I do for you?
Text1_lang: Welcome to my Inn, weary traveler. What can I do for you?

While my brother, Drazial, focuses his analysis on the more physical nature of the beasts of the blasted lands, I tend to focus on the more cerebral and spiritual aspects of the wildlife.$B$BIt is true that the beasts exhibit extremely unusual strength, agility, and stamina, but some of them also possess great intelligence and regenerative abilities, untied to their physical being.$B$BPerhaps you would be interested in helping advance my research, $r?

Text_lang: The beasts of these blasted lands exhibit preternatural attributes, heretofore unseen in nature.$B$BWe have theorized that the energy which was released upon the opening of the Dark Portal, infused into their physical being and forced the creatures to evolve into their current forms.$B$BFearsome beasts they are, no doubt, but we also believe that they could prove to be quite useful in our studies.$B$BPerhaps you would be interested in assisting us in the study of these beasts, $N?

<Tarsis groans.>$B$BThere may still be time... Listen closely, mortal.$B$BThrough time and across the Nether I have searched. Deals made with a host of evil and villainy so wretched...$B$B<Tarsis coughs blood into his hands.>$B$BWould you... would you believe that even Elune has turned her back on me, $r? To die here, in this manner now...

Is this the best they could do?$B$B<Omarion musters the strength to laugh.>$B$BYou do not possess the resolve to face a monster like Kel'Thuzad. You will crumble before his minions - just like those that have come before you...$B$BLeave me here to die. I refuse to return to a world that champions the likes of you.
I have what you need, $c.
I'd like you better if you would apply some perfume.

Watch your step, $r. We of the Brotherhood of the Light are not as lenient as our brethren when it comes to meting justice to those that would do this world wrong.$B$BWoe unto those that would anger Korfax.$B$BNow if you have no business with me or the other members of the Brotherhood, please leave so that we may continue our meeting.
We have all been witness to terrible tragedies, but we must not let them drag us to despair.$B$BInstead, hold those memories close so that one day, we might find a reckoning.
Master craftsman Omarion just vanished one night. Like a toot in the wind... Poof! Gone! Bah, now I'm the only one left to craft the goods for the boys on the front lines.

Text1_lang: Certainly, $N.$B$BAdventurers that the Dawn views as exalted must submit a combined total of 12 insignias to access superior items. To access items of even greater power, they would be required to submit a total of 54 insignias.$B$BThose exalted in the eyes of the Dawn receive the greatest discounts.

Text_lang: What is it that you want, lemming? Get out of my sight before you find out why I am known as the Wrathcaster.
They almost sent my brother, Loksey, to this gathering. He cannot even take care of his hounds, let alone represent the Scarlet Crusade in a competent manner.
The title is misleading. I'm really a very nice person once you get to know me.
I'm far too busy to be playing 'guess the smell' with you, $r. State your business or get out of my sight!

Our caravans go out 'bout twice a day, but I'll be damned if the Scourge haven't gone out of their way to stop Didier and his mules from getting shipments to the front lines. Craziest thing I've ever seen. If only we had the heroic adventurin' types to help protect the shipments...

Text1_lang:
Arlokk is defeated... Let us be silent, even in victory. 

Stalk the shadows with me and together we will strike fear into our enemies.

Text_lang: I am Zanza, a Loa of Zandalar. I have come in this ethereal form from Zandalar to help my people. Hakkar has no dominion over my soul.$B$BI help those that have helped the Zandalarian people.

Behind me is the Altar of Zanza, a sacred place for us Zandalar.  We pray here to bolster our resolve in preparation for war against the Blood God, Hakkar.$B$BProve yourself to the tribe by using the altar to destroy any of the Hakkari Bijous you might find inside Zul'Gurub.  Also, I will trade you Honor Tokens our tribe uses for sets of coins you may find in Zul'Gurub.  Bring me the coins that I seek, and you will be rewarded!

Hail, adventurer. I am Rin'wosho, trader of Zuldazar. I come from the South Seas and bring many exotic goods and items from my homeland.$B$BPerhaps if you prove your worth to my tribe, I shall barter.  If you have any of my tribe's Honor Tokens, then perhaps we shall barter even more.
This cultist is in a deep trance...

Text1_lang: I'd talk to you if you smelled better. Cologne would be nice.
What, you don't have a token to give me? Don't you love me?
We've been so wrapped up in this war, some of us forgot to make time for love.
It looks like you've already found love. You can give me a love token, but I'm not giving you anything nice. I'm waiting for someone special.

Text_lang: No, I'm not, but lots of others are looking for love.  You should buy my love tokens, put on some cologne or perfume, and then pass them around!
Text1_lang: No, I'm not, but lots of others are looking for love.  You should buy my love tokens, put on some cologne or perfume, and then pass them around!

Text_lang: Love tokens are small messages of affection you can give to amorous town and city folk.  Such people will reward you with a gift of adoration.$B$BOr, if you are already adored by another, then at the least they'll give you a gift of friendship.
Text1_lang: Love tokens are small messages of affection you can give to amorous town and city folk.  Such people will reward you with a gift of adoration.$B$BOr, if you are already adored by another, then at the least they'll give you a gift of friendship.

Text_lang: I have long known you'd seek me out, $N.$B$BEvery sentient being in this world is driven by the choices they make.  Choices begat further choices, and these in turn make someone who they are.  This is where your fortune is drawn from - who you are, and the choices you make.$B$BAre you ready to discover where your fortune lies?

Very well then...$B$BYou have been tasked by your liege to guard his fields of corn from poachers and thieves.  One night on patrol, you stumble across a haggard man in thread-bare clothing stealing corn from the field.  You quickly confront him, and he immediately begs for his life.  He claims he is stealing the corn to feed his family since the lord of the land - your liege - demands too much in taxes.  Your liege is indeed known for his harsh taxes throughout the land.$B$BMake your choice.

Your next choice awaits.$B$BYou are the sworn executioner for your liege.  A man has been sent to you for execution as a traitor of the liege and your people.  You know this individual as a close, virtuous friend who mysteriously vanished one day.  You also know that the man's crimes for which he was convicted supposedly caused the deaths of many innocent civilians.  Upon seeing you he begs for his life, claiming he was framed by a higher authority.$B$BMake your choice.

Your fortune is cast, $c.  For the next few hours, you will find your spirit in tune with your true nature.  Be careful, as your fortune - and your fate - are never as clear as you might think them to be.$B$BIf you would like a small glimpse of something to ponder in your future, by all means let me know.  I'd be happy to give you a written fortune, provided you have room in your inventory.  It is one drawn from the insight you have shown in answering my questions.
The fabric of which our world is woven is most delicate. It merely takes some knowledge and the application of said knowledge to tear the fabric. It is thusly that rifts are born.
Where can I send you today $c?
Dare you trade for these tomes and secrets, knowing the power they hold?
Text1_lang: Dare you trade for these tomes and secrets, knowing the power they hold?

Text_lang: Welcome to me shop. What can I do for ye'?
Ah, the beauty of Shadowglen never ceases to delight my senses!
I cannot train a $c such as yourself.
Text1_lang: I cannot train a $c such as yourself.

Text_lang: Even within cold, stone walls such as the ones that shelter this town, one may find tranquility and peace.  In fact, you may find them everywhere you are... simply look inside yourself for such balance.
Text1_lang: Even within cold, stone walls such as the ones that shelter this town, one may find tranquility and peace.  In fact, you may find them everywhere you are... simply look inside yourself for such balance.

Text_lang: My wisdom is yours, as is my knowledge. What can I do for you, $N?
Text1_lang: My wisdom is yours, as is my knowledge. What can I do for you, $N?

Text_lang: Your body looks worn and your spirit weary. Rest yourself beneath our roof and allow Elune to guide your dreams.
Text1_lang: Your body looks worn and your spirit weary. Rest yourself beneath our roof and allow Elune to guide your dreams.

Text_lang: I can't believe the officials in Stormwind, sending the bulk of our army abroad... when our home front is under so much pressure!$B$BWith thieves coming from Westfall and gnolls encroaching from from the east and west, it's a wonder Stormwind itself isn't besieged.
Where are you going?  Well if you're looking to get there quickly, then look no further!
Best deals in all of Stormwind my friend, won't find any better. Now, what can I help you with?
Text1_lang: Best deals in all of Stormwind my friend, won't find any better. Now, what can I help you with?

Text_lang: Best deals in all of Stormwind my friend, won't find any better. Now, what can I help you with?
Text1_lang: Best deals in all of Stormwind my friend, won't find any better. Now, what can I help you with?

Text_lang: Welcome to the Pig and Whistle! Grab a drink my friend and pull up a seat, the more the merrier!
Text1_lang: Welcome to the Pig and Whistle! Grab a drink my friend and pull up a seat, the more the merrier!

Text_lang: I sell only the best gear, tested and true. And the prices are set, so if you want to haggle then go find a Goblin.
Text1_lang: I sell only the best gear, tested and true. And the prices are set, so if you want to haggle then go find a Goblin.

Text_lang: Do I look like I have the time or energy to coddle every tourist that wanders through my door? Tell me what you need, and make it quick.
Text1_lang: Do I look like I have the time or energy to coddle every tourist that wanders through my door? Tell me what you need, and make it quick.

Text_lang: The Wildhammer dwarves might have fast steeds, but can those Aerie Peak gryphons stand the heat of The Great Forge?  I think not!
An illusory sword floats above the mysterious sigil. Its motion gestures toward something. An invitation to a lost relic now accompanying your belongings.
Text1_lang: An illusory sword floats above the mysterious sigil. Its motion gestures toward something. An invitation to a lost relic now accompanying your belongings.

Text_lang: Welcome to Booty Bay, partner.  I hope your stay in my town is enjoyable and uneventful - emphasis on the latter.  We've got plenty of drink if you're thirsty, and plenty of bouncers if you're antsy.$B$BNow then... what can this humble servant of the Steamwheedle Cartel do for you?  Better still - what can you do for me, eh?
I trust the Light is with you, $N. Is there something that I can I help you with?
Text1_lang: I trust the Light is with you, $N. Is there something that I can I help you with?

Text_lang: This is a dangerous place, $N. Be careful around here.

Master Nesingwary has a big hunt ahead of him.  I find helping him prepare for a day in the jungle is much more relaxing than helping him ready for combat.  Although I do miss some of those glorious moments on the battlefield.
Help arrives at last...
Greetings, $r.
Text1_lang: Greetings, $r.

Text_lang: This report details the latest activities in Forest Song. Please take it to Field Captain Hannalah at once.
Text1_lang: This report details the latest activities in Forest Song. Please take it to Field Captain Hannalah at once.

Text_lang: Who are you?! Where am I?! Oh, no. This is very bad. Please, take me to the nearest Dream portal. We need to get out of here.
Text1_lang: Who are you?! Where am I?! Oh, no. This is very bad. Please, take me to the nearest Dream portal. We need to get out of here.

Text_lang: Field Captain Hanalah needs to know what these foul satyrs are up to. Take this report to her now, please!
Text1_lang: Field Captain Hanalah needs to know what these foul satyrs are up to. Take this report to her now, please!

Text_lang: While these treants and shredders are rampaging, "Gobb" here is up to no good. Take this report back to Field Captain Hannalah and see what she thinks.
Text1_lang: While these treants and shredders are rampaging, "Gobb" here is up to no good. Take this report back to Field Captain Hannalah and see what she thinks.

Text_lang: That was a nice long rest. Hmm. This isn't right. Something has gone very wrong. We need to leave. Now.
Text1_lang: That was a nice long rest. Hmm. This isn't right. Something has gone very wrong. We need to leave. Now.

Text_lang: Of all the wondrous places within Darnassus, which would you have me direct you to?
Text1_lang: Of all the wondrous places within Darnassus, which would you have me direct you to?

Text_lang: You have certainly come a long way in your training. There is only one instructor who can train you further. Find Buzzek Bracketswing in Gadgetzan!

Greetings, $c - I'm a Commendation Officer acting on behalf of Ironforge.  It is my duty to assist adventurers who have received Alliance Commendation Signets.$B$BI accept signets in different quantities, but the most beneficial exchange for you is to hand in a set of ten at once.  I will enter your deeds into our records when you hand in your signets.  As a result, you will earn recognition from Ironforge for your duty and service.
Text1_lang: Greetings, $c - I'm a Commendation Officer acting on behalf of Ironforge.  It is my duty to assist adventurers who have received Alliance Commendation Signets.$B$BI accept signets in different quantities, but the most beneficial exchange for you is to hand in a set of ten at once.  I will enter your deeds into our records when you hand in your signets.  As a result, you will earn recognition from Ironforge for your duty and service.

Text_lang: All is gathered, $c. All is being transported for final preparation to Silithus and should arrive within a day. All of our combined forces await the $g hero : heroine; that will complete the reunification of the Scepter of the Shifting Sands, ring the gong and begin the Ahn'Qiraj War.

Text1_lang: $n, my favorite supplier! How can I help you today?

Text_lang: I can teach you the finer points of Tiger Riding, provided you have enough gold to cover the lesson!
Text1_lang: I can teach you the finer points of Tiger Riding, provided you have enough gold to cover the lesson!

Text_lang: By the grace of Elune, I am pleased to offer you the finest steed found anywhere in Teldrassil, and perhaps the world - the nightsaber.  For years, the Sentinel Army has relied on the value of these companions.$B$BTake your time friend and examine each one to your satisfaction.  I am sure you will not be disappointed.
Text1_lang: By the grace of Elune, I am pleased to offer you the finest steed found anywhere in Teldrassil, and perhaps the world - the nightsaber.  For years, the Sentinel Army has relied on the value of these companions.$B$BTake your time friend and examine each one to your satisfaction.  I am sure you will not be disappointed.
Join the fight against evil!  Accept a commission within the Argent Dawn today!

Text_lang: They won't have a brain when you crack open their skull, but every ghoul, every shade, every zombie, skeleton, banshee, abomination - has a soul. They ALL have one... and they weren't so different from you and me.$B$BEvery time you pulverize a scourge into a pile of dust - those memories, experiences, thoughts, feelings... those years. Gone. Forever.$B$BAnd the abominations... ever wonder how many bodies it takes to make a flesh golem? All of that meat, stuffed inside a quilt of skin. Nailed, stitched, bolted together... I have seen it. I have watched it happen. I have heard whose name they scream out for in their final moments.$B$BI pray for their souls. I pray for all of them.
Text1_lang: They won't have a brain when you crack open their skull, but every ghoul, every shade, every zombie, skeleton, banshee, abomination - has a soul. They ALL have one... and they weren't so different from you and me.$B$BEvery time you pulverize a scourge into a pile of dust - those memories, experiences, thoughts, feelings... those years. Gone. Forever.$B$BAnd the abominations... ever wonder how many bodies it takes to make a flesh golem? All of that meat, stuffed inside a quilt of skin. Nailed, stitched, bolted together... I have seen it. I have watched it happen. I have heard whose name they scream out for in their final moments.$B$BI pray for their souls. I pray for all of them.
The plaguelands are an excellent place to strike against the Scourge!

Text_lang: If you desire, in addition to training, I have it within my power to erase the knowledge of your talents from your mind.  Be warned that every time you undergo this procedure the more difficult it is to perform, and therefore the more expensive it becomes.
Text1_lang: If you desire, in addition to training, I have it within my power to erase the knowledge of your talents from your mind.  Be warned that every time you undergo this procedure the more difficult it is to perform, and therefore the more expensive it becomes.

Text_lang: I'm what you call a capitalist, $r.

It is good to see others who fight the Scourge in Stratholme, for it is here they are strongest.$B$BGreetings.  I am Aurius.  I was once a paladin of the Silver Hand, but like others whose faith wavered... I fell from grace.  The Scourge seduced me and nearly transformed me into a death knight!$B$BFinally sensing my peril, I fled to this chapel.  It is a sacred place, where the first paladin, Uther the Lightbringer, was ordained into the order of the Silver Hand.
Look what they did to my boy.
Best deals in all of Stormwind my friend, won't find any better. Now, what can I help you with?
Text1_lang: Best deals in all of Stormwind my friend, won't find any better. Now, what can I help you with?

Text_lang: The time has come for Horde and Alliance to look towards the north and the invasion of the Scourge. In recent days, territories across Kalimdor and the Eastern Kingdoms have come under attack. Will you take up arms to save your land from destruction at their hands?
The orb's markings match the brand on your hand.

Greetings, insects! 

I'm a normal human man, Victor Nefriendius, and I offer you the trials of the dragonflights.

Each provides challenges and rewards, though be warned that taking more than three will benefit no one, other than the wise, all-powerful Lord Nefarian.
What do you need directions to?
Text1_lang: What do you need directions to?

Text_lang: If you have come to save the world then you have come to the right place. The faceless one - the Blood God, Hakkar - has been brought back into our world!
Welcome to the Stormwind Guild Registry offices. What can I help you with today?
Text1_lang: Welcome to the Stormwind Guild Registry offices. What can I help you with today?

Text_lang: $N, you are ready for the ultimate task.  The fiery runes etched on the floor of the molten core are conduits to the realm of fire, and their presence is both an affront to us and a source of power for the Firelords.  They must be extinguished!$B$BTo extinguish a rune, take a vial of aqual quintessence.  Pour it on the rune and its flame will go out, rendering it useless and weakening our enemy!

Text1_lang: Certainly, $N.$B$BAdventurers that the Dawn views as revered must submit a combined total of 14 insignias to access superior items. To access items of even greater power, they would be required to submit a total of 90 insignias.$B$BThose that are revered by the Dawn will find the cost of superior items quite reasonable! The cost for the more powerful items is still high.

The Argent Dawn might be impotent idealists but their delusional leader knows that they are outmatched. I have been sent here as an emissary of the Scarlet Crusade. An ambassador, if you will... It is doubtful that we could even dent the armies of Kel'Thuzad - united or not - but we might be able to contain them long enough for some sort of miracle to happen.$B$BAs for me? I'll die in battle...$B$B<Marjhan shrugs.>
Welcome to Light's Hope Chapel, stranger.

I've traveled here from Dalaran to investigate a theft. It should be impossible for outsiders to enter the city, but powerful artifacts have disappeared from our vaults. Our scryers glimpsed a group of seven hooded figures on horseback, matching the old stories of the Dark Riders of Karazhan.

It is said that before his death, the archmage Medivh would send the Riders out from Karazhan to gather magical artifacts for his research. But Karazhan is silent, and I do not feel the Riders' presence. Where have they gone? And do they serve a new master?

If you find any of the stolen artifacts in your travels, please bring them to me.

If you are willing to help me, I can give you a trinket which will react to the presence of the Riders. Legend says the Riders are invisible unless they wish to be seen, but with the trinket you may force a Rider out of hiding. They are said to be formidable warriors, so I recommend having an ally by your side.

Text_lang:
Evil things, in robes of sorrow once assailed this lord's estate.

You travel now within that valley and through the black curtains see the vast forms that move fantastically to a hidden, and discordant melody.

Text_lang:
Yes yes this way. Ticket holders to the left and any potential VIM in the audience to the right.

Welcome to this evenings production! In the earliest of twilight hour our curtains unfurl and the stage is set for a spectacular performance by some of our up and coming bodies from the Karazhan Actors Troupe. While their sight may not be for sore eyes, and their grace unquestioningly trog like, they will bedazzle with their heart and charm! Once your ticket is presented you may find a comfortable seat and enjoy the show.

Text_lang: Look to this ravaged field and know the power that the elements hold, $r.
